abstract: Wells Fargo said Emerisque, which Hartmax, the men’s clothing company, chose as a buyer, doesn’t provide adequate value to lenders.
snippet: Wells Fargo said Emerisque, which Hartmax, the men’s clothing company, chose as a buyer, doesn’t provide adequate value to lenders.
lead_paragraph: The efforts of Hartmarx, the men’s clothing company, to move out of bankruptcy hit a serious snag on Friday when Wells Fargo, its main creditor, announced its opposition to the company’s choice of a preferred buyer.

headline.main: Hartmarx’s Preference for Buyer Irks Its Bank
headline.print_headline: Hartmarx’s Preference For Buyer Irks Its Bank
